bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Requires the Presiding Officer of the Senate to appoint a committee of 12 Senators to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge G. Thomas Porteous, Jr.
